segments.text: Your house is too small . Why not buy a big one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do wish I could afford one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can get a loan from the bank . You know LPF program provides low cost loans for participants home purchases .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I know that . But don't you notice that the house price is skyrocketing ?
segments.speaker: S2
